title: Scientists developing new vaccine strategy for tuberculosis

title_detail.value: Scientists developing new vaccine strategy for tuberculosis

summary: For years, scientists have been trying to come up with a better way to protect people against tuberculosis, the disease caused by infection with the Mycobacterium tuberculosis (Mtb) bacteria. Researchers say new hope is on the horizon after a recent experiment performed in mice showed great promise.
